column6: Who is the Black Panther? Part 1 (of 6) The Black Panther's origin is retold in a cinematic scope with social satire and all-out action that's sure to excite true believers and the hip hop faithful.
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Klaus Janson | penciller:John Romita JR. | colorist:Dean White
